lrc.lyric:
[00:00.268]
[00:02.204]歌手：迈克尔&保罗
[00:04.038]
[00:10.610]（Michael）
[00:12.328]Every night she walks right in my dreams
[00:15.153]Since I met her from the start
[00:18.033]I'm so proud I am the only one
[00:21.024]Who is special in her heart
[00:23.275]The girl is mine
[00:28.780]The doggone girl is mine
[00:35.286]I know she's mine
[00:39.986]Because the doggone girl is mine
[00:46.174]（Paul）
[00:47.511]I don't understand the way you think
[00:50.349]Saying that she's yours not mine
[00:53.404]Sending roses and your sill dreams
[00:56.313]Really just a waste of time
[00:59.014]Because she's mine
[01:04.721]The doggone girl is mine
[01:10.614]Don't waste your time
[01:15.549]Because the doggone girl is mine
[01:22.550]I love you more than he
[01:25.864]（Take you anywhere）
[01:28.175]（Michael）
[01:28.355]But I love you endlessly
[01:31.780]（Loving we will share）
[01:33.112]（Michael &Paul）
[01:33.691]So come and go with me
[01:37.221]Two on the town
[01:39.301]（Michael）
[01:40.427]But we both cannot have her
[01:43.216]So it's one or the other
[01:46.180]And one day you'll discover
[01:49.118]That she's my girl forever and ever
[01:52.774]（Paul）
[01:53.104]Don't build your hopes to be let down
[01:55.279]'Cause I really feel it's time
[01:58.370]（Michael）
[01:58.886]I know she'll tell you I'm the one for her
[02:01.375]'Cause she said I blow her mind
[02:03.528]The girl is mine
[02:08.837]The doggone girl is mine
[02:15.356]Don't waste your time
[02:20.144]Because the doggone girl is mine
[02:23.776]（Michael &Paul）
[02:23.889]She's mine,she's mine
[02:25.588]No,no,no,she's mine
[02:27.242]The girl is mine,the girl is mine
[02:30.091]The girl is mine,the girl is mine
[02:33.002]（Paul）
[02:33.366]The girl is mine,（yep）she's mine
[02:39.582]The girl is mine,（yes）she's mine
[02:45.000]（Michael）
[02:45.164]Don't waste your time
[02:49.900]Because the doggone girl is mine
[02:57.120]The girl is mine,the girl is mine
[02:59.888]（Paul）
[03:00.000]Michael,we're not going to fight about this,okay
[03:03.002]（Michael）
[03:03.334]Paul,I think I told you,I'm a lover not a fighter
[03:07.634]（Paul）
[03:09.203]I've heard it all before,Michael,she told me that I'm her forever lover,
[03:12.550]You know,don't you remember
[03:14.209]（Michael）
[03:14.479]Well,after loving me,she said she couldn't love another
[03:17.127]（Paul）
[03:17.396]Is that what she said
[03:18.612]（Michael）
[03:18.735]Yes,she said it,you keep dreaming
[03:20.000]（Paul sings）
[03:20.268]I don't believe it
[03:22.439]（Michael &Paul）
[03:22.797]The girl is mine,（mine,mine,mine）

tlrc.lyric:
[00:12.328]每天夜里她都翩然走入我的梦境
[00:15.153]我对她一见倾心
[00:18.033]我很自豪自己是唯一
[00:21.024]在她心中意义非凡的男人
[00:23.275]这女孩是我的
[00:28.780]这死丫头是我的
[00:35.286]我知道她是我的
[00:39.986]因为这死丫头就是我的
[00:47.511]我搞不懂你在想什么
[00:50.349]居然说她是你的而不是我的
[00:53.404]又是送玫瑰，又是做白日梦
[00:56.313]说真的你在浪费时间
[00:59.014]因为她是我的
[01:04.721]那死丫头是我的
[01:10.614]别再瞎忙活了
[01:15.549]因为那死丫头就是我的
[01:22.550]我比他更爱她
[01:25.864]（带着你走遍四方）
[01:28.355]但我对你的爱永无止境
[01:31.780]（我们将一起分享这份爱）
[01:33.691]所以来吧，跟我走
[01:37.221]两个人一起到镇子上
[01:40.427]然而我们两个不能把她同时据为己有
[01:43.216]所以不是你就是我
[01:46.180]然后一天你就会发现
[01:49.118]她永远、永远是我的女友
[01:53.104]不要许下必然幻灭的愿望
[01:55.279]因为我真的觉得时机已到
[01:58.886]我知道她会告诉你，我是她的命中注定
[02:01.375]因为她说我让她神魂颠倒
[02:03.528]这女孩是我的
[02:08.837]这死丫头是我的
[02:15.356]别再浪费你的时间
[02:20.144]因为这死丫头就是我的
[02:23.889]她是我的，她是我的
[02:25.588]不不不，她是我的
[02:27.242]她是我的，她是我的
[02:30.091]她是我的，她是我的
[02:33.366]她是我的，（没错）她是我的
[02:39.582]她是我的，（没错）她是我的
[02:45.164]别再浪费你的时间
[02:49.900]因为这死丫头就是我的
[02:57.120]这女孩是我的，这女孩是我的
[03:00.000]迈克尔，我们没必要因为这个打起来，OK？
[03:03.334]保罗，我想我告诉过你了，我只是个恋爱的，不是个打架的
[03:09.203]我知道，迈克尔，她告诉我说我才是她永远的爱人
[03:12.550]你知道吧，难道你忘了吗
[03:14.479]哦，但是她说她离开我之后感觉不会再爱了呢
[03:17.396]她是这么说的？
[03:18.735]对，就是这么说的，你继续做你的白日梦去吧
[03:20.268]我不信——
[03:22.797]这女孩是我的，（我的，我的，我的）
